title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 185.6 - Notification of termination of employment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 185.6 - Notification of termination of employment

State Regulations

Every licensed armored car carrier shall file with the

Department of State, on a form prescribed by the Department of State, a notice
of termination identifying any armored car guard in their employ who has
retired, resigned, died, been terminated, or has otherwise been removed from
active duty. All armored car carriers shall provide information on the
termination of their armored guard cars from employment to the Department of

State on a notice of termination form. Such form must be completed and mailed
or delivered to the Department of State at the address indicated on the form
within 30 days of the guard's termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
185.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
